title: Budget beauty and the 'dupe' economy
text: Creators are normalizing 'dupe' culture across beauty and fashion. TikTok and YouTube videos comparing low-cost alternatives to premium products routinely outperform brand ads in views and engagement. Comments often frame dupes as a kind of social savvyâ€”proof that the shopper is informed and not easily manipulated by brand premiums. Retailers now merchandise dupes explicitly, reinforcing the behavior.
